Parallels.ab: Y12.4-6 staōmī aṣ̌əm ... vīdaēuuō ahura.t̰kaēšō ~ Yt13.89 staot̰ aṣ̌əm nāist daēuuō fraorənata mazdaiiasnō zaraϑuštriš vīdaēuuō ahura.t̰kaēṣ̌ō.

Y12.4-6 staōmī aṣ̌əm ... nāismī daēuuō ~ VS18.16 staōta aṣ̌əm yat̰ vahištəm nīsta daēuua; quoted by colophons in mss. 2610 [K7b], 2620 [M51a], 4610 [K1] (Pahl.) stāyēm ahlāyīh nikōhēm dēwān (4610 nikōham dew).
staōmī aṣ̌əm ~ VrS1.12, VrS25.14, VrS27.28, VrS90.12 aṣ̌ahe vahištahe staōϑβahe; ~ VrS2.14, VrS17.13, VrS77.13 aṣ̌əm vahištəm staōϑβəm.
staōmī aṣ̌əm quoted by colophons 2610 [K7b], 2620 [M51a] staomi aṣ̌əm ... (Pahl.) stāyēm ahlāyīh.
